welcome_benefits: 2,000 Reward Points when you make purchases of ₹5,000 within 30 days of card issuance, a clear sign that you're valued as a customer.

Rewards Rate: 2 Reward Points per ₹100 for all your online spends, 1 Reward Point per ₹100 for all other spends (exclusions may apply).

product_details: RBL Bank Novio Credit Card is Credilio’s co-branded credit card with RBL.
₹500 + GST, making it a budget-friendly option for everyday spending.
It supports UPI and is available on the RuPay Select network for added ease of use.
2 Reward Points for every ₹100 spent online and 1 Reward Point for every ₹100 spent offline.
